ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.controllers

Class ClaimListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.scandaloutraveltracker.controllers.ClaimListController

  • public class ClaimListController
extends java.lang.Object
    When making edits to the Claim List model it should be done through this ClaimListController class.
    Author:
    Team3ScandalouStopwatch

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ClaimListController()
      Constructor just sets the claimList to the only ClaimList that exists in the app (ClaimList is a Singleton).
      ClaimListController(User user)
      Constructor that is used in getting a specific user's Claim List
      ClaimListController(User user, java.lang.String mode)
      ClaimController constructor that is used for when you are viewing the claims in Approver Mode.
      ClaimListController(User user, java.lang.String mode, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedTags)
      ClaimController constructor that is used for searching for tags

      • ClaimListController

        public ClaimListController(User user,
                   java.lang.String mode)
        ClaimController constructor that is used for when you are viewing the claims in Approver Mode.

        mode - The mode you wish to search in

      • ClaimListController

        public ClaimListController(User user,
                   java.lang.String mode,
                   java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> selectedTags)
        ClaimController constructor that is used for searching for tags
        Parameters:
        user - The current user whose claims you wish to search
        mode - The mode you are searching in (Tags Mode)
        selectedTags - An arraylist of tags that you wish to search
